alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Dougherty; Irwin; Mitchell; Tift; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 25 at 9:30AM EST until January 25 at 10:30AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Irwin County in south central Georgia... Eastern Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Turner County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Tift County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 1030 AM EST. * At 930 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Baconton, or near Putney, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sylvester, Putney, Ashburn, Baconton, Poulan, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Worth, Terrell, Sycamore, Sumner, Rebecca, Bridgeboro, Amboy, Sylvester Airport, Tempy, Parkerville, Inaha, Red Rock, Acree and Lester. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ben Hill; Dougherty; Irwin; Mitchell; Tift; Turner; Worth
